overview: Cute coed Eva has the hots for an exchange student, while a professor has the hots for Eva.  Eva can't stop herself getting involved in extracurricular activities, so the exchange student isn't exactly crazy about the stuff she gets up to and decides she's a bit too much for him to handle
tagline: She put the 'X' in extra credit!  Higher education will never be the same!
title: Educating Eva
